Control.Name: CurrentlyListedAmount
Control.Tooltip: Displays the amount of players listed in the container above

Control.Name: Button1
Control.Tooltip: This field has the biggest size therefore I suggest using it for Player Name.

Control.Name: MassEdit
Control.Tooltip: Enable mass editing.Any EP/GP/DKP modifications will apply to all selected players.

Control.Name: Title1
Control.Tooltip: You want to have it disabled if you use raid summaries.

Control.Name: Title2
Control.Tooltip: Post message everytime players are awarded

Control.Text: This is beta update 2.0 , tested quite intensively and for sure less buggy than previous 1.7.5 version.There are stil a few things that need to be tested. PLEASE post on curse/PM me with bug reports if you encounter them. Client addon for raid members is in the works and right now I'm waiting for Carbine to fix API. With this update "RaidOps" (yup, I'm changing addon name) I have added some raid utilities that in my opinion may prove useful, if you want to have something else to be added let me know and I will implemnt your request. Main addon description will be rewritten with the release of version 2.0. Data for attendance and lootlist is pulled from Raid Summaries. That's all I wanted to say , enjoy :).
Control.Name: BIGPOPUP
OnlineOnly
Control.Tooltip: Display only online players (based on guild roster).

Control.Name: Add100DKP
Control.Tooltip: Adds DKP to all current raid members

Control.Name: QuickAddShortCut
Control.Tooltip: This TextBox is a shortcut to the value that can be set in settings.Press Enter to Submit

Control.Name: LogHelp
Control.Tooltip: Any DKP Modification Require you to set Comment.You can disable them in settings.

Control.Name: ButtonEP
Control.Tooltip: You can addit both EP and GP simultanouesly.

Control.Name: DecayValue
Control.Tooltip: Press Enter to confirm.If this value is set wrongly the decay won't start.

ButtonSettingsForceGuildCheck
Control.Tooltip: If item is Logged in Raid Summaries or Logs, ID field will be attached to this item's name.Depends on Bidding module.

Control.Name: ButtonSettingsCaseSensitivity
Control.Tooltip: WARNING! Enabling this will convert all existing names to lowercase and all new players added manually or automatically will have their names in lowercase.There's no comeback! After enabling just refresh the list.

Control.Name: ButtonSettingsBidModule
Control.Text: Inject controls to Carbine's Master Loot Addon.Enable Bidding Module.
Control.Tooltip: NOTE: The efffect will take place after UI is reloaded.

Control.Name: ButtonShowStandby
Control.Tooltip: List of players that won't be affected by the Decay. Both DKP and EPGP.

Control.Name: ButtonShowGP
Control.Text: Show GP Values on item tooltips*.
Control.Tooltip: In order to use this feature you have to install addon EToolTip and enable ID Display.

Control.Name: ButtonSettingsNameplatreAffiliation
Control.Tooltip: Account will be created only if player's Nameplate Affiliation is the same as your guild's name.

Control.Name: ButtonSettingsEnableNetworking
Control.Tooltip: If item is Logged in Raid Summaries or Logs, ID field will be attached to this item's name.Depends on Bidding module.

Control.Name: TrackUndo
Control.Tooltip: This feature may slow things down.

Control.Text: Decrese GP by X% in PopUp.
Control.Name: Window4
FixUmlauts
Control.Tooltip: This will get rid of umlauts and other non-standard character as they may cause some problems when it comes to player identification.

Control.Name: DisplayRoles
Control.Text: Display role incons on player bars.

Control.Name: SkipGB
Control.Text: Skip Guild Bank PopUp and just add log.

Control.Name: RemoveErrorInvites
Control.Tooltip: Error means anything different than Accepted / Declined.

Control.Text: What do you want to do?

List
Control.Text: Exactly the same as in main widnow
Control.Tooltip: Literally just copies the contents of main window and dumps them in selected format.

Control.Name: ButtonForceClose
Control.Tooltip: Forces the PopUp to close and clears the queue of items.

Control.Name: ButtonSkip
Control.Tooltip: Skips an item and update the loot info accordingly.

Control.Name: Button
Control.Tooltip: Filter out gifts patterns and signs.

Control.Name: ButtonExport
Control.Tooltip: Export during raid session may not work properly as of now.

Control.Name: ExportTab
Control.Tooltip: If Checked exports only selected tab , exports whole raid otherwise.

Window4
Control.Tooltip: Specifies the time you have to log in again.If you log in after specified perioid Raid Session will be automaticaly submitted.

Control.Tooltip: Adds the specified DKP(options) to all RaidMembers.Adds Log to each player with RaidName.
